item.title: Introduce to Solana Token 2022 - new standard to create a token in solana
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Solana Token 2022 Program (Token extensions) is the next generation of the Solana Program Library standard. Token extensions introduce a new set of ways to extend the normal token functionality.
